name: Murray
hint: Longest river in Australia, flowing through New South Wales and South Australia

name: Darling
hint: Longest tributary of the Murray, in New South Wales

name: Waikato
hint: Longest river in New Zealand, flows from Lake Taupo on the North Island

name: Sepik
hint: Longest river in Papua New Guinea, known for its winding course

name: Fly
hint: Second-longest river in Papua New Guinea, with a vast delta

name: Murrumbidgee
hint: Major river of New South Wales, a tributary of the Murray

name: Lachlan
hint: River in central New South Wales, tributary of the Murrumbidgee

name: Cooper Creek
hint: Ephemeral river in central Australia, rarely reaches Lake Eyre

name: Clutha
hint: Longest river in the South Island of New Zealand

name: Swan
hint: River flowing through Perth, Western Australia, famous for its black swans

name: Whanganui
hint: Longest navigable river in New Zealand, granted legal personhood in 2017

name: Fitzroy
hint: Major river in central Queensland, flows through Rockhampton to the Coral Sea

name: Derwent
hint: River flowing through Hobart in Tasmania, spanned by the Tasman Bridge

name: Brisbane River
hint: Winding river through Queensland's capital city, prone to major flooding
